inclusion.criterion: > 18 years of age and signed written informed consent
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients scheduled to undergo major orthopaedic surgery (hip or knee arthroplasty or back surgery)
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: 10 g/dl < Hb < 13.0 g/dl for men and 10 g/dl < Hb < 12.0 g/dl for women, at screening (3 weeks prior to surgery)
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Participation in any other therapeutic trial within the previous month
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: History of thromboembolic events in the family or the patient
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Severe peripheral, coronary or carotid artery disease
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Patients not able to understand the German language
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Suspicion of iron overload (Ferritin >300 μg/l or/and TSAT>50%)
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Active severe infection/inflammation (defined as serum CRP > 20 mg/l) or diagnosed malignancy
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Folate-and/or Vitamin B12 deficiency (according to local lab reference range)
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Known history of hepatitis B/C or HIV-positive
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Liver values 3 times higher than normal
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: A concurrent medical condition(s) that, in the view of the investigator, would prevent compliance or participation or jeopardize the health of the patients.
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Uncomplicated neonatal jaundice that may require phototherapy.
